replies.body: This annoys the bloody hell out of me i swear, like yea i can understand riot games is a company and yes they need to make money to support the games development and servers etc etc but i still think it's unfair to people who simply can't afford even 250 RP meaning they have to miss out on stuff like this and even stuff like key fragment drops are stupidly rare sometimes with you not getting any for weeks at a time but w/e probs gunna be something fun to atleast look at.

Well the game is free to play. Riot has no obligation to be handing out cosmetic items, that have no effect on matches, to it's player base. And you are not really missing out on anything. All items involved are for Hextech crafting only! No icons, wardskins or champion skins - just bonuses to make additional crafts. Please don't complain about small things like hextech promotions. As you said, "Riot games is a company" and they need to "make money". Them giving out free chests every now and again is already a big loss to their sales. The only way they can take those loses back is by giving bonuses to people who purchase.
Wouldn't really count these as a bonus, they're extremely terrible. Would just recommend buying the lunar revel skins instead.

Explanation as to why so i don't sound whiney:
 This is like the output vs input randomness that the devs were talking about. The snowdown shop is random yes, but you know what you are going to get beforehand and can decide if its worth the money. However, this is a situation where we have no idea what we will get when we buy, and we have to hope. This is not a good way to do this.

Also, for those who think that we all who don't like this are hypocritical:
 most people who wanted hextech crafting wanted a way for us to use IP, even if very slowly, to get RP content (ie. skins, icons etc.). 

Making the special chests and envelope things RP exclusive is not a good use of the crafting system for the reasons we wanted the system at the beginning.
 Riot either A: keep this current system but make the envelopes purchasable with IP or 
B: get rid of this system and return to the old RP exclusive snowdown/lunar revel shop deal.
